Group posts by year

11 May 2016 / #jekyll

Here is the code template I am using to make a chronological archive1. {% for post in site.categories.[page.category] %} {% capture year %}{{ post.date | date: '%Y' }}{% endcapture %} {% capture nyear %}{{ post.next.date | date: '%Y' }}{% endcapture %} {% if forloop.first %} <p>{{ year }}</p><ul> {% elsif... more »

Previous/next post within a category

20 Mar 2016 / #jekyll

If your blog lists all posts in only one section, you can always use {{post.previous.url}} and {{post.next.url}} to make links to previous and next posts1. However, sometimes we group our posts in defferent sections by category. In this case, post.previous and post.next are no longer handy to navigate because they... more »
